plot: A talkative manicurist inherits a legacy and the custody of three children from a rich Wall Street broker customer.
plot_en: A talkative manicurist inherits a legacy and the custody of three children from a rich Wall Street broker customer.
plot_es: A talkative manicurist inherits a legacy and the custody of three children from a rich Wall Street broker customer.
title: The Betty Hutton Show
